data.title: How old are the cast members of High School Musical 2?
data.meta_description:
All of the student characters from the first film are still in
their late teens, as were most of the actors and actresses when the
movie was filmed (released August 2007).
New Cast:
Jessica Tuck (Mrs. Evans) was born February 19, 1963.
Robert Curtis Brown (Mr. Evans) was born April 1, 1957.
Current Ages (returning cast):
Zac Efron (Troy) is 30 (born October 18, 1987)
Vanessa Hudgens (Gabriella) is 29 (born December 14, 1988)
Ashley Tisdale (Sharpay Evans) is 32 (born July 2, 1985)
Lucas Grabeel (Ryan Evans) is 33 (born November 23, 1984)
Corbin Bleu (Chad) is 28 (born February 21, 1989)
Monique Coleman (Taylor) is 37 (born November 13, 1980)
Olesya Rulin (Kelsi) is 31 (born March 17, 1986)
Chris Warren Jr. (Zeke) is 27 (born January 15, 1990)
Ryne Sanborn (Jason) is 28 (born February 3, 1989)
KayCee Stroh (Martha) is 33 (born May 29, 1984)
data.text:
All of the student characters from the first film are still in their late teens, as were most of the actors and actresses when the movie was filmed (released August 2007).

New Cast:

Jessica Tuck (Mrs. Evans) was born February 19, 1963.

Robert Curtis Brown (Mr. Evans) was born April 1, 1957.

Current Ages (returning cast):

Zac Efron (Troy) is 30 (born October 18, 1987)

Vanessa Hudgens (Gabriella) is 29 (born December 14, 1988)

Ashley Tisdale (Sharpay Evans) is 32 (born July 2, 1985)

Lucas Grabeel (Ryan Evans) is 33 (born November 23, 1984)

Corbin Bleu (Chad) is 28 (born February 21, 1989)

Monique Coleman (Taylor) is 37 (born November 13, 1980)

Olesya Rulin (Kelsi) is 31 (born March 17, 1986)

Chris Warren Jr. (Zeke) is 27 (born January 15, 1990)

Ryne Sanborn (Jason) is 28 (born February 3, 1989)

KayCee Stroh (Martha) is 33 (born May 29, 1984)

Does the High School Musical cast come to Birmingham England?

The actual American cast of High School Musical will not be coming to Birmingham, but the stage show of HSM will be there from 26thof May-7th of June. To but tickets on line go to: http://www.thisistheatre.com/regional/high-school-musical.HTML.

Are there going to be a high school musical 5?

Yes there will be a high school musical 5 HSM4 is already in the works with the new "sophmore" cast that is being introduced in High School musical 3. The next 2 will highlight some of the primary characters as they grow up and go to college and the like (like will Sharpay and Troy go to the same college- and he ditch Gabriella for Sharpay?) but the other movies will focus on the three new characters that are being introduced in HSM 3 HSM 4 is rumored to have a Miley Cyrus role in it as well.

Are any of the cast members of High School Musical of the Mormon Religion?

I do not know that any of the main cast members are, but several of the extras and support cast were, as the High School Musical movies were filmed in Salt Lake City and St. George, Utah. I do personally know some background dancers and extras from the movies who are members of the church.
